title: PMS 2.0 328 - SUPER Wildcard Weekend Preview, Aaron Jones, Lane Johnson, Warren Sharp, Ariel Helwani, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys are joined by several great guests to preview all the different SUPER Wildcard Weekend games and give a couple of leans for bets over the weekend, and eventually make their picks. First, Analytical NFL guru Warren Sharp joins the program to chat about how he got his start in football, being a civil engineer first, who he likes in this weekend's game, and what he thinks about the Packers in the playoffs (18:44-42:20). Next, 2020 Pro Bowler, 2019 TD Leader, Running Back for the Green Bay Packers and friend of the program, Aaron Jones joins Pat and AJ Hawk to chat about his season, what it's like playing with Aaron, AJ Dillon's progression, what playing in front of fans will be like, and if he's always had this much fun playing football (42:22-57:51). Next, ESPN MMA Insider, friend of the program, and rabid Buffalo Bills fan Ariel Helwani joins the show to place a bet on the Colts/Bills game Sunday, and give a Bills history lesson (1:10:45-1:23:50). Later, Super Bowl Champion, 3x Pro Bowler, All-Pro, Tackle for the Philadelphia Eagles, Lane Johnson joins the show to check in from rehab after a tough ankle injury that ended his season early, and discuss a tough season for the Eagles in general and why he's excited to get back (1:25:15-1:39:55). Lastly, Pat and AJ discuss his knees heading into the NFL Draft, and they each make their picks for SUPER Wildcard Weekend (1:39:57-1:54:43). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
